Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.server.controller

Class DivinityCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.server.controller.DivinityCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apollo, Ares, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Charon, Demeter, Hephaestus, Hera, Hestia, Minotaur, Pan, Prometheus, Zeus
public abstract class DivinityCard
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class representing a divinity card of the game Santorini.
Author:
Maximilien Groh (10683107)

      constructs the divinity with the specified move sequence
      Parameters:
      moveSequence - the list of actions the worker associated with the divinity can take during his turn

      worker - the worker that has to be moved
      currentBoard - the current board of the game

      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      destinationCell - the cell where the worker has to be moved
      currentBoard - the current board of the game

    • build

      public Board build​(Worker worker, Cell destinationCell, Board currentBoard, boolean isSimulation) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a tower level or a dome to the given cell, depending on the current tower's height and returns the updated board
      Parameters:
      destinationCell - the cell on which to build
      currentBoard - the current board of the game
      Returns:
      the updated board with the updated cell's tower's height
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • checkOpponentMove

      public void checkOpponentMove​(WorkerAction action, Worker worker, Cell destinationCell, Board currentBoard) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Checks if the opponents action doesn't break the divinity card rules, and throws an exception if it does
      Parameters:
      action - the action the opponent wants to take
      worker - the worker that wants to take action
      destinationCell - the cell where the action is taken
      currentBoard - the current board of the game
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the action taken is illegal by the divinity card rules

    • typeOfAction

      public WorkerAction typeOfAction​(WorkerAction action)
      Determines the type of action (build or move) based on the divinity card and returns it
      Parameters:
      action - the action taken
      Returns:
      the type of action based on the divinity card

    • getMoveSequence

      public java.util.List<WorkerAction> getMoveSequence()
      Returns:
      the sequence of moves the divinity can take

    • isWinner

      public boolean isWinner​(Board board, Cell previousPosition, Cell currentPosition)
      Determines whether the worker associated with the divinity card is winning or not, based on his previous position and his current position
      Parameters:
      board - the current board of the game
      previousPosition - previous position of the worker
      currentPosition - current position of the worker
      Returns:
      true if he is the winner of the game , false otherwise

    • blockOpponentWinningCondition

      public boolean blockOpponentWinningCondition​(Cell currentPosition)
      Determines if the opponent can win based on his current position
      Parameters:
      currentPosition - current position of the worker that just moved
      Returns:
      true if this divinity card doesn't allow the opponent to win, false otherwise
